title: RARE n284 Buchner Gold Coin Ad-Pieces available for sale or trade for n172 beaters
author: shammus

posts.post_title: RARE n284 Buchner Gold Coin Ad-Pieces available for sale or trade for n172 beaters
posts.post_content:
All are hand-cut of course, on a slightly thicker card stock.  Each of the four shows clear remnants of the heavy black print on both the tops and bottoms of the cards.  Neat examples!  

Prices include shipping.  Also willing to trade for n172s if people have some beaters lying around they're willing to part with!

Gillespie (crease across middle) - $100
Manning - $130
Bennett SGC A - $140
Sullivan - $130

Thanks much,
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]
